page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: The children from Roslin Primary school,aged 8-11yrs,looked at a variety of topics for our project. These were. Clubs-Brownies,Cubs,Girl Guides, Social,Masonic Lodge,British Legion ,Rotary and Miners. Customs-Gala days and Carnivals. Education-Roslin,Bilston,Paradykes school. Events-Inter-sch sports Medaeval Fayre. Farming-Arable,Dairy,Poultry,sheep. Homelife-Joanna Ward Housing-Mobile,Prefabs,council,Private Industry-Mining,Indus-Estate(soft drinks,Whisky,Edin-Castle Rock sweets) Religion-Roslin,Loanhead Churches. Social-Dangers of Bilston Burn Science&Tech-Forestry,animal,poultry pig,sheep,Veteniary Research Station Tourism-Rosslyn Chaple,Hotels,Caravans
